channel.title: How do i change the max lvl to 600
channel.description:
how do i change the max lvl to 600!!!just like god-of ikiliki has on his servers???
i want mine to change because my lvls go to only 99 and i have a phonescape v2 (pk server) if that helps any one
for a free modship if u help me.
MODS OR AMDINS tell me if im not allowed to post this dont lock it please and il edit it.
thanks chris.

item.title: How do i change the max lvl to 600
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Yes zammy king is correct search for return (currentmaxlvl); they change to 600. The max lvl you can have is 135 dude it will crash your server

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the max lvl to 600

item.title: How do i change the max lvl to 600
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

search for

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 100; }
Or something like that all you would do is change the return 100 to 600 and the other 100 to 600.

Read full topic
